main event: Pilot and co-pilot observed a very bright light that appeared to be descending from the northwest, moving erratically and seeming to descend and then ascend towards the aircraft.
interesting points: The object moved erratically and appeared to be descending in a northern direction.
After passing about 30-35 degrees above the horizon, the object appeared to be ascending towards the tail of the aircraft.
The report mentions a second black object that appeared to be the tail of the first object.
The object was described as very bright with an unusually long flaming tail.
sighted object: a very bright light that appeared to be descending and ascending
